fullDescription.intro: The "FreeSurfer Pathways Viewer Node" provides a graphical user interface to visualize the probability distribution of single white-matter pathways or all white-matter pathways simultaneously, calculated by TRACULA (TRActs Constrained by UnderLying Anatomy), a FreeSurfer tool for tractography. (http://surfer.nmr.mgh.harvard.edu/). The FSPV node calls the FreeSurfer tool "freeview" adding, for each chosen tract, default values for visualization: colormap=jet, isosurface=0,0, color='Red'.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: Choose the root directory containing single patient's folders.
Choose one or more tracts to visualize its/their probability distributions.
